value.title: Is Azure Free Account really free? | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use Microsoft Azure for free, for 12 months.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: Create an Azure account
value.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

value.title: Assess your existing software development process
value.excerpt: Find out how to assess efficiency with a value stream map to help you examine your existing release processes and technologies.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
value.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Introduction to Azure virtual networks
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to design and implement fundamental Azure Networking resources such as virtual networks, public and private IPs, DNS, virtual network peering, routing, and Azure Virtual NAT.
